name: Power
description: Those who unleash their inner fury to become living engines of destruction. Warriors of instinct and endurance who trade control for devastating strength.

features.name: Adrenal Surge
features.description: When you roll a natural 20 on a Might check or melee attack, gain temporary Health Points equal to your Might modifier.

features.name: Relentless Drive
features.description: When an attack reduces you below half Health Points, you may make a reaction attack to an enemy within 5 feet of you. This does not have to be the same enemy that attacked you.

features.name: Furious Momentum
features.description: When you reduce a creature to 0 LP, you may move up to 10 ft as part of the same action without provoking opportunity attacks.
